name: Mandi
description: Known as the 'Varanasi of Hills', Mandi is a historic town in Himachal Pradesh famous for its ancient temples, cultural heritage, and scenic beauty. The district is home to numerous temples and offers various trekking opportunities.
summary: A spiritual and cultural hub in the Himalayas

locations.name: Bhutnath Temple
locations.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, known for its architectural beauty and religious significance.

locations.name: Prashar Lake
locations.description: High-altitude lake with a floating island and ancient temple, offering stunning views of the Dhauladhar range.
locations.address: Prashar Lake, Mandi District, Himachal Pradesh
locations.hours: Best time: March to June, September to November

locations.name: Rewalsar Lake
locations.description: Sacred lake surrounded by Buddhist, Hindu, and Sikh shrines, known for its spiritual significance.

locations.name: Joginder Nagar
locations.description: Scenic town known for its hydroelectric project and narrow-gauge railway.
locations.address: Joginder Nagar, Mandi District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Barot Valley
locations.description: Picturesque valley known for trout fishing, trekking, and camping opportunities.
locations.hours: Best time: March to June, September to November
